basic.floral_language:
Paeonia tenuifolia
Floriography: beautiful, warm, loyal 
Paeonia tenuifolia flower is a born beauty, equivalent to that of peony, who was a " Paeonia suffruticosa is the king, and Paeonia tenuifolia is the prime minister”.
Paeonia tenuifolia posture is elegant, flower shape is diverse, color is gorgeous, and scent. Besides used in home decoration and garden ornament, also can be used as a medicinal of heat-clearing and detoxifying. 
Paeonia tenuifolia like sunny places, natural flowering from May and June, viewing period 1 to 2 weeks for each flower. When flowers are wilted, trim withered leaves and flowers, waiting for germinate again in the coming year.
basic.blooming: Flowering period May-June, viewing period 1-2 weeks
basic.color: Flower color red, pink, purple, or in mixture

maintenance.soil: Likes slightly alkaline soil, may use peat adding a small amount of lime or baking soda,
maintenance.sunlight: Long-day plant, likes sunshine, but avoid scorching sunlight
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil is drywater thoroughly when soil is dry, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove old, diseased, dead leaves and withered flowers timely
